channel.title: How to get two handers to work and why do I log out when I do ::pickup?!
channel.description: I want working two handers, like godswords (how they hold it) and when ever I do ::pickup I get logged out. why does it do this?! Please please help me, I will give you rep if you're help works because im very confused :confused:

item.title: How to get two handers to work and why do I log out when I do ::pickup?!
item.dc:creator: @Bathus_Dio1 Bathus_Dio
item.description:
@Bathus_Dio1 wrote:

Well first off with the two handed items I want like godswords and what not to be two handed like on the Project Czar source, and when I do ::pickup (item id) (number of items i want) on a different soruce that I run, I lose connection.

Read full topic
